rule.name: EBML vint efficiency
rule.definition: The bits following the Element ID's Length Descriptor are not more than (8 - ${bit-length-of-length-descriptor}) successive 0 bits, i.e. vint is expressed as efficiently as feasible.

rule.name: Element ID Registered
rule.definition: Ensure MKV Element ID is registered in specdata.xml (as of Dec. 13, 2014 this is 224 registered Element IDs)

rule.name: Element Size 0x7F Reservation
rule.definition: If Element Size is set to 0x11111111 but element size is actually 127 bytes provide a warning.

rule.name: Element Size Byte Length Limit
rule.definition: The first eight bits of any Element Size may not start with 0b00000000.

rule.name: Element Size Unknown
rule.definition: Warning on unknown element sizes, unoptimized MKV.
